feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.4.6.8723
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • f7ca0b8b0642bf4306341be41234f9317c154bad New: Auto tag movies based on tags present/absent on movies [ #9916 ]
  • 56be9502af7838b6215f87d29b89663e86d2e595 Add DevContainer, VSCode config and extensions.json [ #9914 ]
  • 77381d3f727cf2a7b12d994d7f5bd1413b0e08e6 New: Option to prefix app name on Telegram notification titles [ #9913 ]
  • 198e6324e064b339b4a72c1c880057e999412d2d Truncate long names for import lists
  • 81c9537e5a48e09c438134ea86204ce1f1c1f6c3 New: 'Custom Format:Format Name' rename token [ #9835, #9826 ]
  • d3cbb9be8dfdc7665805f8e832251141b33ab3f0 New: Detect shfs mounts
  • 2e043c0cf71496054815a672a0dea5cc092c8c1b Bump version to 5.4.6

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.5.3.8819
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 685f462959e4e57e226b7fd902e7e0909d3d2a2c New: Include trending and popular options for Discover Movies
  • 7be8a3413031b48300701ddaaa68ed16bda7f169 Automated API Docs update
  • 886711b496a21c6145a29de2ef4f3f974488935f New: LanguageId filter added to all movie endpoint
  • 5185e037da5e8cba547e61f69a6b39fdb2c9db6d Automated API Docs update
  • 38e7e37d57f7affff8576ac3efcf340e0d2b7986 Refactor movie tags for CustomScript, Webhook and Notifiarr events [ #10003 ]
  • 190c4c5893d303b027cd38b49eca47330c84e793 New: Blocklist Custom Filters [ #9997 ]
  • 0ec18ce4b3a33dc86d26ae208438629fdae78626 New: Parse 480i Bluray/Remux as Bluray 480p [ #10010 ]
  • a08575b7bc499a7ff16357ffc66a36b5a0e3e349 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 556cc885eca48cfc45b34722ed8f61011282886d Refactor PasswordInput to use type password
  • 586c0c6e1313cba8c9e778a85f0e4a89303d0cc5 Fixed: Notifications with only On Rename enabled
See More * cec569461d1b42a44406c943969030121d802723 Fixed: Text color for inputs on login page * 8b79b5afbf88cad2fa1bd5db5fdb14bf930feeae New: Dark theme for login screen [ #9998 ] * cd4552ce6f4715b5beb3754ecef437a3b063a7bd New: Support stoppedUP and stoppedDL states from qBittorrent [ #9995 ] * 256439304be392731e13cacb9997153d01ef0ce0 Use number input for seed ratio [ #10000 ] * bb44fbc362ebe7abc4c3934057ade51dd820f59c New: Root folder exists validation for import lists * cd401f72f55e4aca803561adee9cc58a15d54b66 Automated API Docs update * c9624e75501132aaae20a4c8380b4ab29e55f515 Fixed: Ignore invalid movie tags when writing XBMC metadata [ #9984 ] * 649702eaca58ca577c836c079917cb68f0876a0a Fixed: Indexer flags for torrent release pushes * 1c52f0f5bd64975bddf147f889448372e80944ee Automated API Docs update * dff85dc1f3e97f00a7e42234ddd99457c38e81f5 New: Display excluded label for movies in collections * 1090aeff7580622d894dcc2823a1e47a69f6135b Fixed: Ignore exclusions in missing movies for collections [ #9966 ] * 086a0addba6b794ac962e1e9d912bcff3dec8f9c New: Config file setting to disable log database (#9943) * 8b6cf34ce4ba96395b715ca2c110a21813807af0 Fixed: Parsing long downloading/seeding values from Transmission [ #9987 ] * 7f03a916f1ba011d25107d37a3fa6f83ccc679e9 New: Optionally use Environment Variables for settings in config.xml (#9985) * 3a6d603a9e02ebfde263e138e30281b91fc82384 Add file-count for Transmission RPC [ #9973 ] * cd2c7dc7fbe55a57dfa54f7a1f8a9b0ffd8fe1c6 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * f1d76c34837bcee2b320463d3d540947e2f1b326 Fix translations for SSL settings * 39eac4b5add38d602cc0319783fd3c89be779560 Add missing translation key * 71e1003358ddbbe5ecdedc4ca3d6d0781a5188c9 Forward X-Forwarded-Host header * 89b6a5d51f5f78240e5672d977f4f6f0ab605373 Bump version to 5.5.3 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=101&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.6.0.8846
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 077b041d3f49cc286f843cd65c7690b323c146e5 Fixed: Revert "Validate that folders in paths don't start or end with a space"
  • ff3dd3ae423a2cea0ded46ecd43f157e1afa813f Tests for Wanted pages
  • 2e3beddcbc6b26160f6469174c4d7ccd07e36303 Fixed: Sorting by movie titles in Missing/Cutoff Unmet under Postgres
  • dc068bbf3d12deb663a5131bb15ed676432b3cec Automated API Docs update
  • 7a303c1ebf732667ab74b9d6a23bdc7f8340b486 Remove not implemented endpoints from API docs
  • 152f50a1ef977298ef0415ccda6e84d83b37661b New: Wanted Cutoff/Missing
  • 97982025890910b13dbd271cde5dab3bbb8f0c19 Add missing translation for External
  • 7969776339602f88fcc0e379c0acbe98a67723e1 Rename file for getMovieStatusDetails
  • 288982d7bd6dc9cc160f3d3ab5c85ac4457b2ca7 Bump Npgsql to 7.0.7
  • d39a3ade5b637b6a9bfdec6d28552820a1008e0f Automated API Docs update
See More * 1fc6e88bc4652b6d225aecdd3338578c5ba537dd New: Add `isExisting` flag for movies in collections API * e8e1841e6c37ea6c694c969da09fc3e6c778ae8c New: No Release Dates availability message * d17eb4f33f0322659e130d365462108c4bb4ee1d Bump version to 5.6.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=102&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.7.0.8882
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 8809c207bb1f9279b8960f9184550ee80151560b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1be2cded74362136978af8e2932cad399d5ad5ec Fixed: Importing from IMDb list [ #10090 ]
  • 0a189d00ef980b6dbe0de2130bff1a38d3ad2dd7 New: Display stats for delete movies modal [ #10093 ]
  • 5fc63ecb3fc1a3609231a1b8348920640c9b5cba New: Ignore inaccessible folders when getting folders
  • 3a74393d058ba6176a7e4638f4036d20c75efa37 Fixed: Ensure TMDb import lists are paginated
  • 4cbf5cfc57fcdddd686a779b35b06888b3baa70a Fixed: Adding movies with unknown items in queue
  • 797142d6f3e1719aa40f61d8b8120bd12409000b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 2a472c50c1a87e7a8b75a301376b982d0541c77d Automated API Docs update
  • a12ff68fbda3b0bded975b071cc393138090c7ee Fixed: Skip invalid movie paths during validation [ #10079 ]
  • 194926c7dd3f11c53f78a8208049008f04770ef6 Ignore Grabbed from API docs [ #10082 ]
See More * 7dee5bb6894b74efdc044897b1cc0a8e2aa1a3a1 Rename Sonarr to Radarr * 9b24dab71b0cc3deaaf83214cff03e5fcf959a56 Fixed: Improve error messaging if config file isn't formatted correctly * 62e1c02fe21c92d099ca9df6645a641e8c6a2ae1 Fixed: Ignore case when resolving indexer by name in release push * 99b3d61862f2077e9646a7acbb438e26021594cc Fixed: Ignore case for name validation in providers * bd905567dea342598cae48bcb9f9120d25dc9d30 Fixed: Map covers to local for grabbed movies * a8eea20d696ee8612fbfbcbe4370f9005f8c28b2 Fallback to remote url for backdrop image * 69ad0caf40696f1c5b1bcb0c196f57fcab5de232 Fixed: Avoid NullRef for Movie Resources with a null tags field * 8a5c0ffd18574bc30bd45983b956f85b99797bb0 New: Refresh cache for tracked queue on movie add * c8b409ed0b8820b187827ac75166a6603587fbcb Added some missing indexes to database * c5bcb13f637aa5b80a4d441e41a07d81d0ba0c9d Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 80de71165423a39ec01c4bd1a339708a05ca335b Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk, SharpZipLib and Polly * 3fb558411e73ff988ac6077f88b230efee8b8d03 Include year in page title for movie details * 98384ab3905cc4ee2d63113f381f6014d1ee3c7f Automated API Docs update * 0c654377f493fcb0f31f852efc8561330b1c52cb Fixed: Manual Interaction Required with possible null movie [ #10053 ] * e8c925274abfcea18e84a1c9ed35c80c5cd4adeb Implement equality checks for providers * 320bfeec16209e30b4023864c47242f9c013021f Fixed: Trimming slashes from UrlBase when using environment variable * 638f92495cea757ad07bed6df9819f0381c9abfc Bump version to 5.7.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=108&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.8.3.8933
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 93d661242a283b93a93105e9d9765c935a1e9e2b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 324dac8db3a77e78011300d92fa3b156fea56b19 New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32
  • bba69d8b2240e98dda31389d4195c83078c0df29 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1366f6e8b4d1960558fb4f170272ba47c05c4a45 New: Show update settings on all platforms [ #10184 ]
  • f79712951b081fcb4fdfcc030f9bcaa31aadbd7a Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows UNC path [#10162 ]
  • 101b04675381ea08e7a48470e0fe7639967ed66b Fix custom formats sorting for quality profiles
  • cd713e7252f4e2be4c40def6eb654c75ee75f4ac New: Sort by tags on movie index
  • a54f54eb6efc492ad0fed4a52cc2b85539aca309 New: Add option to show tags on movies Poster and Overview [ #10176 ]
  • f2af7a1b727c5be24e3fda1b58e6ba2c0153b658 New: Use natural sorting for lists of items in the UI [ #10177 ]
  • a5b48153a6fb22b5a2ee6e51df8f8a9265414152 New: Add a few spanish release groups to exceptions (#10120)
See More * 1804e486d6d80306596d23e47b73cf69ba6ab1dc New: Wrap specifications in Custom Format and Auto Tagging modals * b490177a77f583126b88a3d4330e879e1b121e8d Remove extraneous indentation in RemoveFileExtension * 7a90b4a6b2d6fee59881b76834a6e63c0283adc7 Bump version to 5.8.3 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=114&_a=release-summary).

What's Changed

  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Remove extraneous indentation in RemoveFileExtension' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10171
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'New: Wrap specifications in Custom Format and Auto Tagging modals' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10180
  • New: Add a few spanish release groups to exceptions by @eagnoor in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10120
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows UNC path' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10183
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10105
  • New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10189
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10191

New Contributors

  • @eagnoor made their first contribution in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10120

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/compare/v5.8.2.8915...v5.8.3.8933

What's Changed

  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10097
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Exclude invalid releases from Newznab and Torznab parsers' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10109
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'New: Ignore Deluge torrents without a title' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10112
  • Update API docs by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10115
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Reprocessing items that were previously blocked during importing' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10117
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Limit Queue maximum page size to 200' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10119
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Already imported downloads appearing in Queue briefly' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10128
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Trimming disabled logs database' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10130
  • Fixed: add non-numeric codec tags to SourceRegex in QualityParser by @martylukyy in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10155
  • Update SonarCloud pipeline versions for UI by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10157
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Remove extraneous indentation in RemoveFileExtension' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10171
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'New: Wrap specifications in Custom Format and Auto Tagging modals' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10180
  • New: Add a few spanish release groups to exceptions by @eagnoor in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10120
  • Pull Sonarr commit 'Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows UNC path' by @servarr in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10183
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10105
  • New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10189
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10191

New Contributors

  • @martylukyy made their first contribution in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10155
  • @eagnoor made their first contribution in https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/pull/10120

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Radarr/Radarr/compare/v5.7.0.8882...v5.8.3.8933
